tool.name: Editconf
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the GROMACS editconf module.

param.name: input_gro_path
param.label: input GRO,PDB file
param.help: Path to the input GRO file. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: outname_output_gro_path
param.label: output PDB,GRO name
param.help: Path to the output GRO file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: distance_to_molecule
param.label: distance_to_molecule
param.help: Distance of the box from the outermost atom in nm. ie 1.0nm = 10 Angstroms.

param.name: box_type
param.label: box_type
param.help: Geometrical shape of the solvent box.
param.option: cubic - rectangular box with all sides equal

param.name: gmx_lib
param.label: gmx_lib
param.help: Path set GROMACS GMXLIB environment variable.

param.name: gmx_path
param.label: gmx_path
param.help: Path to the GROMACS executable binary.
